mapper.insert: insert into tb1_board(title, content, writer) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.select: SELECT bno, title, content, writer, regdate, viewcnt FROM tb1_board WHERE bno = #{bno}
SELECT bno, title, content, writer, regdate, viewcnt FROM tb1_board WHERE bno > 0 ORDER BY bno desc, regdate desc
